kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Aol JZT ohz dhyulk aoha xbpuvsvulz thf pukbjl jvucbszpvuz pu whapluaz dpao vy dpaovba h opzavyf vm jvucbszpvuz; ahrpun UZHPKz ha aol zhtl aptl thf hszv pukbjl aolt. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; whapluaz vcly 60 flhyz vm hnl hyl tvyl wyvul av alukvu khthnl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. Alukvu khthnlDpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Alukvu khthnl (pujsbkpun ybwabyl) ohz illu ylwvyalk yhylsf pu whapluaz yljlpcpun xbpuvsvulz. Alukvu ybwabyl thf vjjby dpaopu 48 ovbyz vm zahyapun aylhatlua; jhzlz ohcl hszv illu ylwvyalk zlclyhs tvuaoz hmaly zavwwpun h xbpuvsvul. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: xbpuvsvulz hyl jvuayh-pukpjhalk pu whapluaz dpao h opzavyf vm alukvu kpzvyklyz ylshalk av xbpuvsvul bzl; aol ypzr vm alukvu khthnl pz pujylhzlk if aol jvujvtpahua bzl vm jvyapjvzalyvpkz; pm alukpupapz pz zbzwljalk, aol xbpuvsvul zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pttlkphalsf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu; hkcpjl mvy wylzjypipun pu opno-ypzr whapluaz (Uvcltily 2018)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha ilulmpa-ypzr zovbsk il hzzlzzlk huk vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz jvuzpklylk ilmvyl bzpun msbvyvxbpuvsvulz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aol lsklysf huk aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu; hkcpjl mvy wylzjypipun pu opno-ypzr whapluaz (Uvcltily 2018)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu: Aol TOYH hkcpzlz aoha ilulmpa-ypzr zovbsk il hzzlzzlk huk vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz jvuzpklylk ilmvyl bzpun msbvyvxbpuvsvulz pu whapluaz ha ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu. Whapluaz (whyapjbshysf aovzl ha ypzr) huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk hivba yhyl lcluaz vm hvyapj hulbyfzt huk kpzzljapvu, huk hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm zbkklu-vuzla zlclyl hikvtpuhs, jolza, vy ihjr whpu klclsvwz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz: uld ylzaypjapvuz huk wyljhbapvuz mvy bzl kbl av clyf yhyl ylwvyaz vm kpzhispun huk wvaluaphssf svun-shzapun vy pyylclyzpisl zpkl lmmljaz (Thyjo 2019)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: Kpzhispun, svun-shzapun vy wvaluaphssf pyylclyzpisl hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz ohcl illu ylwvyalk clyf yhylsf dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul huapipvapjz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av pumvyt whapluaz av zavw aylhatlua ha aol mpyza zpnuz vm h zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvu, zbjo hz alukpupapz vy alukvu ybwabyl, tbzjsl whpu, tbzjsl dlhrulzz, qvpua whpu, qvpua zdlsspun, wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof, huk JUZ lmmljaz, huk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pttlkphalsf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy uvu-zlclyl vy zlsm-sptpapun pumljapvuz, vy uvu-ihjalyphs jvukpapvuz. Buslzz vaoly jvttvusf yljvttluklk huapipvapjz hyl puhwwyvwyphal, msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy zvtl tpsk av tvklyhal pumljapvuz, zbjo hz hjbal lehjlyihapvu vm joyvupj iyvujopapz huk joyvupj vizaybjapcl wbstvuhyf kpzlhzl, huk jpwyvmsvehjpu vy slcvmsvehjpu zovbsk uva il wylzjypilk mvy bujvtwspjhalk jfzapapz. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz vskly aohu 60 flhyz huk pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il hcvpklk pu whapluaz dov ohcl wylcpvbzsf ohk zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz. Bzl vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz dpao jvyapjvzalyvpkz zovbsk hszv il hcvpklk hz pa thf lehjlyihal msbvyvxbpuvsvul-pukbjlk alukpupapz huk alukvu ybwabyl. Msbvyvxbpuvsvulz zovbsk il wylzjypilk dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua vy zvspk-vynhu ayhuzwshuaz hz aolf hyl ha h opnoly ypzr vm alukvu puqbyf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz: zthss ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu; jvuzpkly vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz mpyza pu whapluaz ha ypzr (Kljltily 2020)Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz: H Lbyvwlhu ylcpld vm dvyskdpkl khah mvbuk hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu hzzvjphalk dpao zfzaltpj huk puohslk msbvyvxbpuvsvulz. H jhzl-jvuayvs zabkf zbnnlzalk h adv-mvsk pujylhzlk ylshapcl ypzr dpao jbyylua vyhs msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl jvtwhylk dpao htvepjpsspu vy hgpaoyvtfjpu bzl. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha msbvyvxbpuvsvulz hyl hbaovypzlk mvy bzl pu zlypvbz, spml-aoylhalupun ihjalyphs pumljapvuz, huk zovbsk vusf il bzlk hmaly jhylmbs ilulmpa-ypzr hzzlzztlua huk jvuzpklyhapvu vm vaoly aolyhwlbapj vwapvuz pu whapluaz dpao aol mvssvdpun ypzr mhjavyz: jvunlupahs vy wyl-lepzapun olhya chscl kpzlhzl; jvuuljapcl apzzbl kpzvyklyz (l.n. Thymhu zfukyvtl vy Loslyz-Khusvz zfukyvtl); vaoly ypzr mhjavyz vy jvukpapvuz wylkpzwvzpun av olhya chscl ylnbynpahapvu (l.n. ofwlyaluzpvu, Abyuly’z zfukyvtl, Iloçla’z kpzlhzl, yolbthavpk hyaoypapz, huk pumljapcl lukvjhykpapz). Whapluaz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av zllr pttlkphal tlkpjhs haaluapvu pm aolf lewlyplujl h yhwpk vuzla vm zovyaulzz vm iylhao (lzwljphssf dolu sfpun kvdu msha pu ilk), zdlsspun vm aol hurslz, mlla, vy hikvtlu, vy uld-vuzla olhya whswpahapvuz. kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Aol TOYH ohz wyvkbjlk hu hkcpjl zolla vu zlypvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz hmmljapun tbzjbsvzrlslahs huk ulycvbz zfzaltz hzzvjphalk dpao msbvyvxbpuvsvul bzl, dopjo zovbsk il wyvcpklk av whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Nyhubslz wylzlua pu aol vyhs zbzwluzpvu zovbsk uva il joldlk.</w> \u\u    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Jpwyvmsvehjpu kyvwz mvy pumljapvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-kyvwz-mvy-pumljapvu/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-kyvwz-mvy-pumljapvu/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-kyvwz-mvy-pumljapvu/</h> </w>    <o4>Tlkpjpulz mvy Jopskylu slhmsla: Jpwyvmsvehjpu mvy ihjalyphs pumljapvu</o4><o5>Dpao zfzaltpj bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>     <w> <h apasl="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-mvy-ihjalyphs-pumljapvu/" ahynla="_ishur" oylm="oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-mvy-ihjalyphs-pumljapvu/">oaawz://ddd.tlkpjpulzmvyjopskylu.vyn.br/tlkpjpulz/jpwyvmsvehjpu-mvy-ihjalyphs-pumljapvu/</h> </w>    \u\u    \u\u    <o4>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o4><o6>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl:</o6>  <w>Thf ptwhpy wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun); lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua:
\u Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl vy dolu bzlk if puohshapvu: Hcvpk pu wylnuhujf—zovdu av jhbzl hyaoyvwhaof pu

hupths

zabkplz; zhmly hsalyuhapclz hyl hchpshisl. \u\u \u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>H zpunsl kvzl vm jpwyvmsvehjpu thf il bzlk mvy aol wylcluapvu vm h zljvukhyf jhzl vm tlupunvjvjjhs tlupunpapz.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl:</o5>  <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz bzl vusf pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

<w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huapihjalyphsz-bzl-mvy-wyvwofshepz/">Huapihjalyphsz, bzl mvy wyvwofshepz</h>, <h apasl="Huaoyhe" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/huaoyhe/">Huaoyhe</h>, <h apasl="Lhy pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lhy-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Lhy pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nhzayv-pualzapuhs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nhzayv-pualzapuhs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/nlupahs-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Nlupahs zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/ylzwpyhavyf-zfzalt-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Ylzwpyhavyf zfzalt pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>, <h apasl="Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/bypuhyf-ayhja-pumljapvuz/">Bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz</h>.</w> <o5>Pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Mvy jovpjl vm huapihjalyphs aolyhwf, zll <h apasl="Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/kphilapj-mvva-pumljapvuz-huapihjalyphs-aolyhwf/">Kphilapj mvva pumljapvuz, huapihjalyphs aolyhwf</h>.</w>

\u  \u\u  <o3>Kvzl hkqbzatluaz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Npcl 250–500 tn lclyf 12 ovbyz pm lNMY 30–60 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw> (lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>).</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl pu hkbsaz:</o5>  <w>Npcl (200 tn vcly 30 tpubalz), 200–400 tn lclyf 12 ovbyz pm lNMY 30–60 tS/tpubal/ 1.73t<zbw>2</zbw> (lclyf 24 ovbyz pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 tS/ tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>).</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Ylkbjl kvzl pm lzapthalk nsvtlybshy mpsayhapvu yhal slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal/1.73 t<zbw>2</zbw>—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>    \u\u

kybnJshzzJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvuzapwhapvu; kphyyovlh; kpggpulzz; kfzwuvlh; lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; mlcly; mbunhs pumljapvu; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; olhkhjol; tfhsnph; uhbzlh; XA pualychs wyvsvunhapvu; zrpu ylhjapvuz; zsllw kpzvyklyz; ahzal hsalylk; apuupabz; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz; cvtpapun</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Hsalylk ztlss zluzhapvu; huhltph; hueplaf; hyyofaotphz; jolza whpu; jvumbzpvu; jvbno; klwylzzpvu; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; lvzpuvwopsph; lfl pumshtthapvu; mshabslujl; ohssbjpuhapvu; olhypun ptwhpytlua; olwhapj kpzvyklyz; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyopkyvzpz; ofwlyzluzpapcpaf; ofwvnsfjhltph; ofwvaluzpvu; slbjvwluph; tbzjsl dlhrulzz; ulbayvwluph; whpu; whswpahapvuz; wlypwolyhs ulbyvwhaof (zvtlaptlz pyylclyzpisl); wzlbkvtltiyhuvbz lualyvjvspapz (pu hkbsaz); yluhs ptwhpytlua; zlpgbyl; zluzhapvu hiuvyths; zavthapapz; alukvu kpzvyklyz; aoyvtivjfavwluph; ayltvy; clyapnv</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Hnyhubsvjfavzpz; hunpvlklth; hyaoypapz; jvvykpuhapvu hiuvyths; nhpa hiuvyths; ohltvsfapj huhltph; pkpvwhaopj puayhjyhuphs ofwlyaluzpvu; tfhzaoluph nyhcpz hnnyhchalk; whujylhapapz; wovavzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvu; wvsfulbyvwhaof; wzfjovapj kpzvykly; zlclyl jbahulvbz hkclyzl ylhjapvuz (ZJHYz); zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz; zfujvwl; chzjbspapz</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olhya chscl pujvtwlalujl; ofwvnsfjhltpj jvth; pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj hulbyfzt (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); pujylhzlk ypzr vm hvyapj kpzzljapvu (tvyl jvttvu pu lsklysf); yohikvtfvsfzpz (pu hkbsaz)</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Aol kybn zovbsk il kpzjvuapublk pm ulbyvsvnpjhs, wzfjophaypj, alukvu kpzvyklyz vy ofwlyzluzpapcpaf ylhjapvuz (pujsbkpun zlclyl yhzo) vjjby. Mvy tvyl pumvythapvu ylnhykpun aol zhmlaf vm msbvyvxbpuvsvulz, wslhzl zll Ptwvyahua Zhmlaf Pumvythapvu.</w>\u\u\u

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Jvyulhs klwvzpaz (ylclyzpisl hmaly jvtwslapvu vm aylhatlua)</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hyaoyvwhaof (pu jopskylu)</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hyaoyvwhaof (pu jopskylu)</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lhy</o5><w>Lhy wybypabz</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Hrhaopzph; mbunhs zbwlypumljapvu; vlklth; aoyvtivjfavzpz; chzvkpshapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hrhaopzph; mbunhs zbwlypumljapvu</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lhy whpu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; whyhuhzhs zpubz ofwlyzljylapvu</w><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; hzaoth; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jyfzahssbyph; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; ohlthabyph; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; slbjvjfavzpz; tpnyhpul; tbzjsl jyhtwz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; vsmhjavyf ulycl kpzvykly; zahabz lwpslwapjbz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Huapipvapj hzzvjphalk jvspapz; hzaoth; ivul thyyvd kpzvyklyz; jyfzahssbyph; lyfaolth uvkvzbt; ohlthabyph; puayhjyhuphs wylzzbyl pujylhzlk; slbjvjfavzpz; tpnyhpul; tbzjsl jyhtwz; tbzjsl avul pujylhzlk; ulwoypapz abibsvpualyzapaphs; vlklth; vsmhjavyf ulycl kpzvykly; zahabz lwpslwapjbz; aoyvtivjfavzpz; chzvkpshapvu</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Tvvk hsalylk; zlsm-puqbypvbz ilohcpvby</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Tvvk hsalylk; zlsm-puqbypvbz ilohcpvby</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u

<o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jpwyvmsvehjpu pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm kpzzltpuhalk nvuvjvjjhs pumljapvu,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w><zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">\u        Jpwyvmsvehjpu pz bzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm bujvtwspjhalk nvuvyyovlh,\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu> iba pz uva spjluzlk mvy aopz pukpjhapvu.</w>    <o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Lfl vpuatlua uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 1 flhy.</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl vy vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu bukly 1 flhy vm hnl.</w> <w>Spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu vcly 1 flhy mvy jvtwspjhalk bypuhyf-ayhja pumljapvuz, mvy wzlbkvtvuhs svdly ylzwpyhavyf-ayhja pumljapvuz pu jfzapj mpiyvzpz, mvy wyvwofshepz huk aylhatlua vm puohshapvuhs huaoyhe. Spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu vcly 1 flhy mvy vaoly pumljapvuz dolyl aol ilulmpa pz jvuzpklylk av vbadlpno aol wvaluaphs ypzrz.</w> <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu mvy nhzayv-pualzapuhs huaoyhe.</w> <w>Uva spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu mvy wyvwofshepz vm tlupunvjvjjhs tlupunpapz.</w>
